segments.text: Welcome to Lincoln Bank . What can I help you with , Sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure if I'm at the right counter , but I need some advice on mortgages , can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , no , I can't . But our specialist can . Please take a seat and our Mortgage Adviser will come out to see you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , Sir . He'll be with you in just a minute . Could I get you something to drink while you are waiting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A black coffee with 2 sugars would be much appreciated , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
